sheets.name: BasicTimeFunctions
sheets.query: SELECT '${reportTitle}' as ReportTitle, '${CURRENT_TIMESTAMP}' as CurrentTime_UTC, '${NOW}' as CurrentTime_NOW, '${CURRENT_DATE}' as CurrentDate, '${CURRENT_TIME}' as CurrentTime, '${GETDATE}' as SQLServerFormat

sheets.name: KoreanTimeZone
sheets.query: SELECT '${KST_NOW}' as KST_Now, '${KST_DATE}' as KST_Date, '${KST_TIME}' as KST_Time, '${KST_DATETIME}' as KST_DateTime, '${KST_ISO_TIMESTAMP}' as KST_ISO_Format

sheets.name: KoreanDateFormat
sheets.query: SELECT '${KOREAN_DATE}' as KoreanDate, '${KOREAN_DATETIME}' as KoreanDateTime, '${KOREAN_DATE_SHORT}' as KoreanDateShort, '${WEEKDAY_KR}' as WeekdayKorean, '${MONTH_KR}' as MonthKorean, '${YEAR_KR}' as YearKorean

sheets.name: FilenameExample
sheets.query: SELECT '${department}' as Department, 'Report_${DATE_YYYYMMDD}_${department}.xlsx' as RecommendedFilename, '${KOREAN_DATE} ${WEEKDAY_KR} Report' as TitleExample, 'WHERE created_date >= ''${DATE_YYYY_MM_DD}'' AND department = ''${department}''' as QueryConditionExample

sheets.name: TimestampUsage
sheets.query: SELECT '${UNIX_TIMESTAMP}' as UnixTimestamp, '${TIMESTAMP_MS}' as MillisecondTimestamp, '${ISO_TIMESTAMP}' as ISOFormat, '${DATETIME_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS}' as FilenameDateTime, 'backup_${DATE_YYYYMMDD}_${department}' as BackupFilenameExample
